title: Luxury 1 bedroom + Den apartment in West Loop with Amenities
posting_body: Amazing 1 bedroom + 1 den in the heart of west loop in the best building.
Sublease from September 7 - November 28 for $3150 per month.
You have the option to renew if you would like to stay for an additional time directly with the building.
Good opportunity to try first for 2.5 months to see if you love it (which you will).
This layout with this view is rarely available, I think this is one of the best units in the building because of the layout and view.
Not many of these in the building.
Open to selling / leaving some of the furniture.
Parking is optional at $300 per month, I currently have a spot I can sign over to you (free electric car charging).
Amazing building with sky deck, pool, , gym, golf simulator, pool tables, and lots of common areas for working space, dog run, and more.
It is the 727 W Madison Building (feel free to look on the website).
